text: Peter von Gomm (born August 23, 1968) is an American–Japanese voice actor. He moved to Japan in 1995 and records English voice acting for Japanese media. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes !Ref. |- |2001 |Zoids: New Century |Bit Cloud |Alternate English dub; pilot | |- |2017 |Azure Striker Gunvolt: The Anime |Copen |English dub | |- |2018 |Free!
